comments.body: When using `--single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt` we need to specify `setuptools` at build time. (I am actually puzzled that this worked without it. Maybe `boto3` installed it?!)

Yeah, I have seen `setuptools` get installed anyways. I bet if we disable [`add_pip_as_python_depedency`](https://github.com/conda/conda/blob/65d514ed043ed7dacaef60a9cef4ac731f3b11db/conda/config.py#L76) then this will stop happening. We probably should start doing that for other reasons. ( https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/551 ) ( https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/552 )
Just tested this theory and it does work.
